question:
To make Oreo cookies look like a spider,

Choices:
A: make four pretzel stick pieces stick out of either side.
B: stick M&M candies all along the edges of the cookie.
steps: To make something look like a spider, it usually involves creating legs.
If you make four pretzel stick pieces stick out of either side, you will have a total of eight legs.
This leg arrangement will resemble a spider.
On the other hand, sticking M&M candies along the edges of the cookie wouldn't resemble a spider.
Therefore, the correct choice is A: make four pretzel stick pieces stick out of either side.
